snippet: Ryan Murphy’s latest venture understands that, as one character puts it: “Feuds are never about hate. Feuds are about pain.”...

headline.main: AP PHOTOS: Editor Selections From the Past Week in Asia
headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: Editor Selections From the Past Week in Asia

lead_paragraph: Ryan Murphy’s latest venture understands that, as one character puts it: “Feuds are never about hate. Feuds are about pain.”
